Hi, i'm a Staff Site Reliability Engineer at Google in New York City. I work primarily on ensuring the stability of Google's internal developer tools such as our Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery platforms. Both in and out of work i'm a practiced Gopher and Linux enthusiast. In my free time I occasionally stream on Twitch but my passion is playing jazz with various bands.
